data.expected_result: Text should not shake or move
data.short_description: Text shifts up and down after mentioning and clicking enter
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a server which has less members (some servers which has more then 1000 won't work, but around 30 will work)  - Mention somebody (works with (at)everyone too)  - Click enter (but don't send the message, make a new line)  - Start typing - Will only work with system/keyboard font Roboto (regular) and fonts similar to it - Will not work in discord Testers (this server)
